title: NATE BERKUS, JEREMIAH BRENT, TYLER CAMERON AND MORE DESIGN A NIGHT OF FUN AT SYMPHONY SPACE (SPONSORED)
description: The worlds of design, comedy, literature, and pop culture collide for one night only as Nate Berkus brings Jeremiah Brent (Queer Eye), Tyler Cameron (The Bachelorette), writer and comedian Jessi Klein (Dead to Me), and NPR radio personality Emma Choi (Everyone & Their Mom) to the Symphony Space stage for a playful evening of games, readings, and conversation celebrating his new book, Foundations.
